thread.section_title: Macro Mediterranean Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Macro Mediterranean | macro-mediterranean.com
thread.title: Andrea Roche
thread.title_full: Macro Mediterranean reviewed by Andrea Roche

author: Andrea Roche
title: Andrea Roche
text:
It was very easy to order from Macro Mediterranean online, I was notified of the shipping date after the staff confirmed and clarified my online order .
Food was clearly labeled with name of the food and heating instructions.
All the entrees I ordered were deliscious and I had no digestive issues, which I frequently experience after eating certain foods.
I also ordered the chocolate chip walkmeal and carrot cake and they were a delightful and delicious addition to the entrees .
Andrea R.
Pennsylvania
